short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that displays your realtime age upto 10 decimal places.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your Live Age is a fun and useful extension that calculates and displays your real-time age down to 10 decimal places. Watch your age tick forward every second as this extension updates continuously.
